Module src
Package BoardDrawingGame.logic

Class AIPlayer

java.lang.Object
BoardDrawingGame.Entities.Player
BoardDrawingGame.logic.AIPlayer
public class AIPlayer extends Player
The AIPlayer class represents an AI player in a Dots and Boxes game. It extends the Player class and includes logic for making moves based on different strategies. The AIPlayer can be adjusted with a specific game board and utility class for game operations. The APlayer class also has a difficulty which can be adjusted when playing in a server game. The AIPlayer has the ability to make moves, including attempts to create a line that completes a square (point), selecting random lines, and avoiding lines that would complete a square with three sides already drawn, and calculating the best possible line.
Author:
Ali Kaan Uysal, Bas Van Dijk

      Parameters:
      board - The game board associated with the AIPlayer.
      utility - The utility class for game-related operations.
      playerColor - The color representing the AIPlayer for the GUI.

    • AIPlayer

      public AIPlayer()
      Default constructor for the AIPlayer class. It creates a new game board and utility class with a default grid size of 5.
